issue.title: how to include my own models into gzweb.

content.raw:
Unfortunately, the menu on the left panel is currently hard-coded, so new models added to the database won't show up there unless the source code is changed. See issue #42.

A way around it for now is to create a world with your robot in it and start gzserver with that world, as explained on issue #42.

I'll be marking this issue as duplicate, let me know if I misunderstood your problem and we can reopen the issue.
content.html:
Unfortunately, the menu on the left panel is currently hard-coded, so new models added to the database won't show up there unless the source code is changed. See issue #42.

A way around it for now is to create a world with your robot in it and start gzserver with that world, as explained on issue #42.

I'll be marking this issue as duplicate, let me know if I misunderstood your problem and we can reopen the issue.
